net.blitzcube.mlapi.api

Interface IMultiLineAPI


  • public interface IMultiLineAPI
    Represents the core of MultiLineAPI providing various utility methods and functionality with regards to the API's primary goal.
    Since:
    May 23rd, 2018
    Author:
    iso2013

    • Method Detail

      • getTag

        ITag getTag(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Get the tag associated with the specified entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity whose tag to retrieve
        Returns:
        the tag or null if none

      • getOrCreateTag

        ITag getOrCreateTag(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Get the tag associated with the specified entity. If no tag has yet been associated, create one instead.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity whose tag to retrieve or create
        Returns:
        the created tag

      • deleteTag

        void deleteTag(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Delete the specified entity's tag (if present). If the entity has no tag, this method will fail silently.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity whose tag to delete

      • hasTag

        boolean hasTag(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Check whether the specified entity has a tag or not.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to check
        Returns:
        true if the entity has a tag, false otherwise

      • addDefaultTagController

        void addDefaultTagController(ITagController controller)
        Add a default tag controller. Default tag controllers are applied to entity types specified by ITagController.getAutoApplyFor().
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller to add

      • removeDefaultTagController

        void removeDefaultTagController(ITagController controller)
        Remove a default tag controller.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller to remove

      • getDefaultTagControllers

        Set<ITagController> getDefaultTagControllers()
        Get an immutable Set of all default tag controllers.
        Returns:
        all default tag controllers

      • getDefaultTagControllers

        Collection<ITagController> getDefaultTagControllers(org.bukkit.entity.EntityType type)
        Get an immutable Collection of all default tag controllers for the specified entity type
        Parameters:
        type - the type of entity
        Returns:
        all default tag controllers

        Parameters:
        entity - the entity whose tag should be updated
        target - the player who the update should be sent to
